div.div: District #95 Schools are closed for 'in-person instruction,' or face-to-face interactions, through the end of the 2019-2020 school year. Remote Learning continues.
div.a: Read More about District #95 Schools Closed Through May 22

div.div: District #95 introduces a new resource for reading, the 6,000-plus book catalogue Renaissance MyON Reading database. Keep reading.
div.a: Read More about Renaissance MYON Reader Resource

img.alt: Meal Pickup and Delivery Days and Times Changed

div.a: Meal Pickup, Delivery Days and Times Changing
div.div: Starting Monday, April 13, 2020, District #95 will have new Meal Pickup and Delivery times and dates. Pickup will be from 7:30 a.m. to 12 p.m. noon Monday, Wednesday and Friday, and Bus Delivery from 9 a.m. to 12 p.m. noon Monday, Wednesday and Friday. (Two days' worth of meals will be distributed on those days.)
div.a: Read More about Meal Pickup, Delivery Days and Times Changing

div.p:
OUR MISSION
The mission of Carbondale Elementary District #95 is to prepare its students to live harmoniously, cooperatively, and productively in a global community.

div.div: 925 S Giant City Rd, Carbondale, IL 62902 | Phone 618-457-3591 | Fax 618-457-2043
